thread.title: Chrissy Teigen’s black dress looked difficult to get into but totally sexy, so slay!
thread.title_full: Chrissy Teigen’s black dress looked difficult to get into but totally sexy, so slay!

author: Gabriela Herstik
title: Chrissy Teigen’s black dress looked difficult to get into but totally sexy, so slay!
text:
Chrissy Teigen’s black dress looked difficult to get into but totally sexy, so slay! If there was an award for “most beautiful yet complicated dress,” it would have gone to Chrissy Teigen in her intricate Roberto Cavalli dress . The model looks like a knock out on the red carpet thanks to her a floor-length, intricately corseted, sheer gown. And with her windswept, caramel curls and a simple bronze eye and lip, Chrissy stole the show, even though we’re not sure how she managed to get in her dress! Straps on straps on straps!
Lester Cohen/Getty But in true Chrissy Teigen nature, we’re sure she laughed herself into this strappy and stunning number.
Alberto E. Rodriguez/Getty With the perfect smokey eye and bronzed lip, Chrissy looks effortless but incredible.
As per usual, Chrissy and husband John Legend were absolute RELATIONSHIP GOALS! They look like perfect little dolls.
Alberto E. Rodriguez/Getty Images for NARAS We love Teigen’s sense of humor, and even more than that, we love that she has green fingers from eating Fun Dip.
I ate fun dip with my fingers last night and I'm stained and Grammys are tomorrow. I've tried everything please help pic.twitter.com/Atr66KJcYo 
— christine teigen (@chrissyteigen) February 11, 2017 No one will stop asking about my green fingers
— christine teigen (@chrissyteigen) February 13, 2017 
Either way, not to worry Chrissy, we’ll be staring at your dress.
